entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
